segments.text: Yes , I am looking for a coat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any style in your mind ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I recommend you this one . It's a very popular kind of coat-the most recent thing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it's good in style , but I am afraid it doesn't wash well .
segments.speaker: S2
